item.description:
Urban Shamanism is the contemporary application of shamanic practices for use in healing, problem solving, self-discovery, and personal growth. It is a living, evolving system of healing tools.

These tools transform and heal the conflicts between body, mind and spirit created by the chaotic pace of modern life.

There will be no Circle this evening.

organizer's note:
This class is the most requested and well received class we give. I personally have given this discussion at Book Stores, Churches and Metaphysical shops, all to very positive gatherings. If there is a class you don't want to miss, this is the one!
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Urban Shamanism
